snippet.title: Wall World 2 | Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
A new chapter of mysterious adventures awaits!

The adventure in the mysterious world of the Wall continues! Pilot your robospider into its depths, uncover lost artifacts and technologies, upgrade your exosuit and spider, and battle the horrors lurking in the dark. Unravel the mysteries buried in the depths of the Wall! Wall World 2 builds upon everything that made the first game a thrilling rogue-lite adventure - expanding the world, more exciting combats, and adding more ways to explore, fight, and survive. 

Wishlist now on Steam: https://s.team/a/3467710
Follow us on Twitter: https://x.com/alawarteam
Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/alawar
